product_name: Quiksilver Syncro 3/2mm Back-Zip GBS Full Wetsuit - Men's
long_description: Updated with lighter, stretchier neoprene for enhanced movement, the Quiksilver Syncro 3/2mm Back-Zip GBS Full Wetsuit helps you get more enjoyment out of your time paddling in chilly water.
short_description: Updated with lighter, stretchier neoprene for enhanced movement, the Quiksilver Syncro 3/2mm Back-Zip GBS Full Wetsuit helps you get more enjoyment out of your time paddling in chilly water.
